headline: Flagstar Financial, Formerly NYCB, Looks Like An Interesting Deep Value Play
summary: Flagstar Financial, formerly NYCB, is undervalued despite risks in real estate. Read why FLG stock is a deep value play with a price-to-book ratio of 0.49.

headline: Sheffield Financial and Scarab launch new nationwide retail financing partnership
summary: WINSTON-SALEM, N.C., Jan. 21, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Sheffield Financial, a division of Truist Bank and a leader in fast, flexible retail financing, is excited to announce a new national partnership...
